description: JP Richards is the coolest DJ at the hottest all male strip club in town.  Auditions for the week have come down to two individuals: Draven Torres and Nubius.  Both have the moves, the look, and the attitude.  But who will JP choose?!Nubius starts off the audition with some blazing hot moves he's been working on lately.  He's not afraid to show JP everything he's got.  When JP's seen enough, he calls Draven up to the practice stage.  Draven also has firing dance skills!  The only way JP can settle this is by experiencing both guys at the same time.  That means taking each of their dicks at the same time.  JP joins them on the small stage and allows Nubius to face fuck him, while Draven pounds JP's ass on the other side.  After this hot action, the decision is even MORE difficult to make!  See what happens when all three hotties end up on stage at the real club the next night!  You won't believe the intense, hardcore sex that winds up being put on display!Enjoy!
series: NDE - E145 - Nubius, Draven Torres & JP Richards
title: Making the Cut
